coupon.sys.core.coupon.system

Class CouponSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.coupon.system.CouponSystem

  • public class CouponSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a singleton class - it is basically the only instance of the system.
    It responsibilities are:
    1.Load all the DAOs classes
    2.To start the Daily Coupon Expiration Task - a thread that runs every 24 hours and deletes all the expired coupons
    3.Get an instance of the connection pool
    Author:
    Yehuda.Hizmi

      • getInstance

                                throws CouponSystemException

      • login

        public ClientFacade login(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String clientType)
                   throws CouponSystemException
        This method responsible to return a Client Facade based on the login
        Parameters:
        name - - The user name
        password - - the user password
        clientType - - one of the following: ADMIN, CUSTOMER, COMPANY
        Returns:
        - Return the relevant facade based on the login
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - general exception with the message "Wrong user name or password please try again" and the object e causes it

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws CouponSystemException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is activated in order to shutdown the system. It responsible to:
        1.Stop the Daily Coupon Expiration Task thread and
        2.Close all the connections in the connection pool
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws exception were thrown from other methods
        java.lang.InterruptedException - - throws exception were thrown from other methods
